Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: pia~poctoloc n~niremEyaus: pia~gioc Yekla Humanoc: n~tef ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O Ethiopian Apostle, Saint Takla Haymanout, that He may forgive us our sins.
